default.sql: INSERT INTO PUSH_DEVI_LDGR_HIS( USE_INTT_ID , HIST_SEQ_NO , DEVICE_ID , PUSH_ID , PUSHSERVER_KIND , MODEL_NAME , OS , RETRANS_YN , REMARK , DEL_YN , REGR_ID , REG_DTM) SELECT USE_INTT_ID , ( SELECT (coalesce( max(HIST_SEQ_NO),0)+1 ) FROM PUSH_DEVI_LDGR_HIS WHERE 1=1 AND USE_INTT_ID = :USE_INTT_ID AND DEVICE_ID = :DEVICE_ID ) HIST_SEQ_NO , DEVICE_ID , PUSH_ID , PUSHSERVER_KIND , MODEL_NAME , OS , RETRANS_YN , REMARK , :DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , :REGR_ID AS REGR_ID , to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDDhh24miss') AS REG_DTM FROM PUSH_DEVI_LDGR WHERE 1=1 AND USE_INTT_ID = :USE_INTT_ID AND DEVICE_ID = :DEVICE_ID
